function.name: determine_params
function.description: This function used to extract the information from the conversation.

user_name.description: This property stands for user's name. It returns '' when name wasn't provided in the conversation.

user_contact_number.description: This property stands for user's phone number. it returns '' when phone number wasn't provided in the conversation.

user_email_address.description: This property stands for user's email address. it returns '' when email address wasn't provided in the conversation.

user_post_code.description: This property stands for user's postcode. it returns '' when postcode wasn't provided in the conversation.
